title: Chemical Test Methods of Analysis - Y. Zolotov-WaRlOrD
description:
Book: Chemical Test Methods Of Analysis
This book focuses on the descriptions and applications of various test methods, which are used widely in environmental, industrial, clinical, forensic and medical fields amongst others.

The use of rapid test methods of chemical analysis allows fast, simple and cost-effective analyses to be performed. These tests are primarily used on-site, i.e. the place where the samples are located instead of in the laboratory. Also, owing to the ever-increasing number of samples to be analysed, preliminary screening and selection of samples is becoming a necessity even in the laboratory The tests described in this book can also be used for this purpose. This book provides the general characteristic features of test methods and systems (e.g. definitions, advantages and limitations, procedures and protocols) and discusses the application of the test methods in various areas. Tools pertinent for solving each concrete analytical task are also discussed.
